name: X-MASK Token
description: X-MASK is a community oriented web 3.0 application ecosystem platform based on blockchain technology, linking blockchain with the real world to build a prosperous web 3.0 commercial application ecosystem. Established X-Capital and X-Labs, focusing on investment and incubation in the De Fi, NFT, and Game Fi sectors, to explore and cultivate more high-quality Web 3.0 projects.
